sentences.en: Some of the best services for the seniors are sponsored by philanthropic organizations.
sentences.cn: 一些一流老人服务机构是由慈善组织资助的。

sentences.en: We saw a gap in the philanthropic space that we could fill.
sentences.cn: 我们看到了可以去填补的慈善空间。

sentences.en: Q: Will you follow Warren Buffet and Bill Gates in philanthropic pursuits?
sentences.cn: 问：你会追随沃伦巴菲特和比尔盖茨的慈善行动吗？
